plot: This Pete Smith Specialty showcases former heavyweight boxing champion 'Max Baer' with various sparring partners in the ring. Slow motion is used to illustrate how Baer uses his skills.
title: Fisticuffs
plot_es: This Pete Smith Specialty showcases former heavyweight boxing champion 'Max Baer' with various sparring partners in the ring. Slow motion is used to illustrate how Baer uses his skills.
plot_en: This Pete Smith Specialty showcases former heavyweight boxing champion 'Max Baer' with various sparring partners in the ring. Slow motion is used to illustrate how Baer uses his skills.
